DataSource.Query: SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY customers.customer_name) AS "S No.", quotations.quotation_id as "Pick Id", customers.customer_name, quotations.expected_delivery_date as "delivery date", quotations.internal_memo, ' ' as "Delivery man" FROM sales.quotations JOIN inventory.customers ON quotations.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN sales.quotation_details ON quotations.quotation_id = quotation_details.quotation_id WHERE quotations.office_id = @OfficeId and quotations.cancelled = false AND quotations.expected_delivery_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date group by quotations.quotation_id, customers.customer_name, quotations.expected_delivery_date order by customers.customer_name;
